summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Jes Staley, Roy Navon, and Jacob Frenkel discussing a meeting with Prime Minister Netanyahu. The email highlights the significance of the meeting and indicates a connection to JPMorgan Chase.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is involved in the correspondence regarding a meeting with Prime Minister Netanyahu.

persons.name: Roy Navon
persons.role: Managing Director, Senior Country Officer, Israel
persons.context: Roy Navon initiates the email chain, announcing the granted meeting with Prime Minister Netanyahu.

persons.name: Jacob Frenkel
persons.context: Jacob Frenkel is included in the email correspondence about the meeting with Prime Minister Netanyahu.

connections.description: Roy Navon and Jes Staley are both associated with JPMorgan Chase, indicating a professional relationship.
Roy Navon includes Jacob Frenkel in the email regarding a significant meeting, suggesting a professional connection.
Jes Staley and Jacob Frenkel are both included in the email chain, indicating a professional relationship through their connection to the meeting.

events.title: Meeting with Prime Minister Netanyahu
events.description: A meeting has been granted with Prime Minister Netanyahu, which is considered significant.

keyFacts: The email discusses a meeting with Prime Minister Netanyahu that was granted against the odds.
Roy Navon is identified as the Managing Director and Senior Country Officer for Israel at JPMorgan.
Jes Staley is also involved in the correspondence regarding the meeting.
Jacob Frenkel is included in the email chain, indicating a professional relationship with the other parties.
The correspondence is marked as confidential treatment requested by JPMorgan Chase.
